title: Motor racing-Formula One drivers' form sheet
text: April 4, 2018 / 8:52 AM / Updated 10 hours ago Motor racing-Formula One drivers' form sheet Reuters Staff 3 Min Read April 4 (Reuters) - Formula One drivers' form sheet ahead of Sunday's Bahrain Grand Prix in Manama (listed in championship order and with the most recent races first): Number=race result, R=retired, DQ=disqualified, NS=did not start, NQ=did not qualify. 2018 2017 2016 AU/AE BR MX US JP MY SG IT BE HU GB AT AZ CA MC ES RU BH CN AU/AE BR MX Sebastian Vettel 1 3 1 4 2 R 4 R 3 2 1 7 2 4 4 1 2 2 1 2 1 3 5 5 Lewis Hamilton 2 2 4 9 1 1 2 1 1 1 4 1 4 5 1 7 1 4 2 1 2 1 1 1 Kimi Raikkonen 3 4 3 3 3 5 NS R 5 4 2 3 5 14 7 2 R 3 4 5 4 6 R 6 Daniel Ricciardo 4 R 6 R R 3 3 2 4 3 R 5 3 1 3 3 3 R 5 4 R 5 8 3 Fernando Alonso 5 9 8 10 R 11 11 R 17 R 6 R R 9 16 -
